senses.sense_definition: A major city in northern Italy, the capital of Lombardy, known for fashion, finance, and history.

examples.text: We are planning a trip to <w>Milan</w> for the holidays.
The train to <w>Milan</w> departs from the central station.

senses.sense_definition: A professional football club based in Milan, Italy; short for AC Milan.

examples.text: He has been a loyal supporter of <w>Milan</w> for twenty years.
The match between Inter and <w>Milan</w> is always exciting.

senses.sense_definition: A male given name of Slavic origin.

examples.text: My colleague <w>Milan</w> helped me finish the project.
<w>Milan</w> is a popular name in several European countries.
